prod_short_desc: Help Disney’s Mickey Mouse get his roadster ready for the next race!
prod_long_desc:
Little Mickey Mouse fans will love to build and rebuild the race car, starting gate and Mickey-shaped gas pump. Help them develop fine motor skills as they play at filling up the car and tuning it up for the race. Then line up at the starting gate—and he's off! Includes a LEGO® DUPLO® figure: Disney's Mickey Mouse.
Includes a LEGO® DUPLO® figure: Disney’s Mickey Mouse in his racing outfit.
Features a buildable roadster with removable spoiler, starting gate, and a gas pump shaped like Mickey Mouse’s iconic ears.
Includes bricks decorated as a gas pump and a starting gate sign.
Help your little Mickey and the Roadster Racers fan build and refuel the car ready for Mickey Mouse's next big race.
Create endless exciting racing stories with this iconic Disney character.
Help your child master basic construction skills with this easy-to-build model.
LEGO® DUPLO® products are specially designed to be fun and easy for little hands.
Mickey Mouse’s roadster measures over 1” high, 4” long and 1” wide.
Starting gate measures over 4” high, 3” wide and 1” long.
